page.title: 15PORTHMADOG ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Most of the town's entertainment takes place at the{Ganolfan.}Here concerts are held,and many local events such as the Xmas pantomime and summer variety shows put on by the Madoc Amateur Musical Society.There are also two badminton courts here and during the winter five-a-side football is popular.During the summer are held wrestling matches and craft fairs.The hall is also used for discos,and classes such as Ballet,P.T and Weight- Watchers.It is our centre for all indoor entertainment.We also have a park with three hard tennis courts, crazy golf,putting and a children's playground.In the town are whist and bridge clubs,a Women's Institute and Merched y Wawr.From here too runs the narrow_gauge Festiniog Railway to Blaenau Ffestiniog.Over the Cob lies the Italianate village of Porthmeirion
